General.Name: Swancor Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Swancor Holding Co., LTD. manufactures and sells chemical products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers vinyl ester for anti-corrosion tan; pipe for factories, desulfurization tank; and chimney for power plants. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Nantou City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 9 Industry South 6 Road, Nantou City, Taiwan, 54066
